description: Generates a Component from a Flow, with all of its inputs, and outputs.

flow_name.info: The name of the flow to run as a sub-component.

success.build_config_updated: Build configuration updated for flow '{flow}' with {count} inputs
success.sub_flow_executed: Sub flow '{flow}' executed successfully with {outputs} outputs

info.using_tweaks: Using {count} parameter tweaks for sub flow '{flow}'

warnings.flow_not_found: Flow '{flow}' not found in available flows
warnings.no_outputs: Sub flow execution completed but no outputs were generated

errors.failed_to_get_flow_names: Failed to retrieve available flow names: {error}
